channel.title: I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST
channel.itunes:summary: Actor/Director Michael Rapaport shares his strong, funny & offensive points of view on life, sports, music, film & everything in between on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST

channel.description: Actor/Director Michael Rapaport shares his strong, funny & offensive points of view on life, sports, music, film & everything in between on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST

item.title: EP 406 - Metta World Peace (NBA Champ) + LITIGATION LEBRON vs. NICK SABAN/GMOODY DUNK TRAINING/DONTE DIVINCENZO DELETING/WILD WILD COUNTRY PODCAST
item.description:
The Gatekeepers of Disruptive Behavior aka The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody are here to go Hard Body Karate and discuss: The Upcoming I AM RAPAPORT/Wild Wild Country (on Netflix) Creators Podcast, Donte DiVincenzo Deleting Twitter, a Parkland School Student Being Hailed a Hero, Mad Dog Chris Russo vs Boomer Esiason, LeBron James vs Nick Saban due to Barber Shop Talk, a murderous monkey in India & more. Then it’s a tremendous honor to have NBA Champion SF Metta World Peace (25:42) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Being Queens Born & Bred, when he knew he was becoming an elite NBA player, arguing with Stephen Jackson About Who’d Guard the Other Team’s Best Offensive Player, The Indiana Pacers (Reggie Miller, Larry Bird, Al Harrington & more), The Malice at The Palace, Mental Health in the NBA, Ty Lue & Staying in Shape Post-Retirement, The Big 3, his Gradelo App, Digital Media, Kobe Bryant, Playing AAU with Elton Brand, Lamar Odom & Erick Barkley, The State of Defense Today, Toughest Guys to Guard, The Los Angeles Lakers, Who he’d pick between Kobe, MJ, LeBron & Durant and a whole lotta mo’!

Michael’s Hardcover/Audiobook 
This Book Has Balls: Sports Rants From The MVP of Talking Trash (www.ThisBookHasBalls.com). All Butter Soft T’s & Hats can be found at www.DistrictLines.com/iamrapaport. Boston: Live I AM RAPAPORT Tour Date: August 26th, 2018. Tickets are Available at: https://thewilbur.com/artist/i-am-rapaport/

item.title: EP 405 - Torrey Smith (2x Super Bowl Champ) + WWHL SNAPPING/THE ROOT GETS THAT WILLIE HUTCH TREATMENT AGAIN/NBA HALL OF FAME SELECTIONS/SICK F*CKS OTW
item.description: This episode of the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST is coming to you Live & Direct from the NYC Gloom Tomb. While Gerald parks the car, The Gringo Mandingo aka Michael Rapaport kicks us off SOLO to discuss: Snapping against Kenya Moore on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen and Hands Out That Willie Hutch Treatment to the online publication The Root & @MichaelHarriot for trying to go 15 Rounds with the Jake LaMotta of Podcasting. Gerald arrives and The Disco Two of Always Ready GMoneti aka The 3x Podcast Co-Host of the Year aka Gerald Moody joins Michael (26.48) in the NYC Gloom Tomb to discuss: The Upcoming NBA Playoffs, NBA Hall of Fame Selections, People Politicizing The Parkland School Shooting, That Civil War Sentiment, Roseanne & T.V. Reboots, Sick F*cks sending Fan Mail to the Parkland Shooter, Interviewing DJ Premier, Gerald’s Secret to Dunking, Viceland’s Story on Advanced Sex Dolls, Sick F*cks of the Week, A podcast recommendation & more. Then it is an honor and a privilege to have Carolina Panthers Wide Receiver Torrey Smith (01.15.08) (2x Super Bowl Champion with the 2012 Baltimore Ravens & 2017 Philadelphia Eagles) join Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: His Post Super Bowl Experiences, Off Season Workouts, Eagles QB Situation, The Super Bowl victory with the 2012 Baltimore Ravens, The In-Game Blackout, Colin Kaepernick, Beating the New England Patriots, Malcolm Butler Being Benched, Best Trash Talkers, Ray Lewis, Favorite NFL Wide Receivers, Love of Basketball, Best Basketball Players in the NFL & more. Finally Michael plays a chapter on Geno Auriemma from his Hardcover/Audiobook “This Book Has Balls” (ThisBookHasBalls.com). All Butter Soft T’s & Hats can be found at DistrictLines.com/iamrapaport. Boston: Live I AM RAPAPORT Tour Date: August 26th, 2018. Tickets are Available at: https://thewilbur.com/artist/i-am-rapaport/

item.title: EP 404 - Dennis Paige (Slam Magazine Founder) + YOUNG SHOOTER CHRONICLES/ROSEANNE REBOOT/LAURA INGRAHAM GETS THAT WILLIE HUTCH TREATMENT/SICK F*CK OTW
item.description: The Gringo Mandingo aka Michael Rapaport & The Young Shooter aka Dean Collins are together on set to discuss: An upcoming podcast with DJ Premier, men that Skeet Too Soon, Kelly Anne Conway’s Husband aka Georgie Conway, The Roseanne Reboot, Shaming Those Who Shame Ben Affleck, Laura Ingraham Gets That Willie Hutch Treatment, Sick F*cks of the Week & a whole lot more. Then it’s a tremendous honor to have Slam Magazine Founder & CEO Dennis Paige on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Their Top 100 Player Edition, Who voted on this list, who got #1, Being old enough to watch Wilt, Which older players could play today, SLAM covers with Allen Iverson, Marbury & KG, LeBron, Telfair & more, Players with the most covers, Biggest regrets, The 1996 Rookie Cover, How players feel about the Slam Magazine, their different channels & 1st All Star Game, High School Players to look out for, Lottery Pick Predictions & a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed! All Butter Soft T's are at: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport. Michael's Book and Audio Book is available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com.

item.title: EP 403 - Portugal. The Man (Grammy Champs) + NFL ALL PRO DAY IN L.A../A GIANTS PLEA FOR SAQUON BARKLEY/SOCIAL MEDIA PRIVACY UPROAR/SICK F*CKS OF THE WEEK
item.description: It’s a Primetime Podcast with The Gatekeepers of Disruptive Behavior aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody ft. Grammy Winning artists John Gourley & Zach Carothers of Portugal. the Man. The Disco Two kicks things off on this brand new I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST by discussing: Air Max Day Scavenger Hunting, Michael being invited to a workout by Jacksonville Jaguars RB Leonard Fournette in L.A. with other NFL Stars, The Facebook Privacy Uproar, Sick F*cks of the Week & more! Then John & Zach (35:52) (members of The Rapapack) join Michael & The Young Shooter aka Dean Collins to discuss: What other podcasts they listen to besides I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST, Growing up in Alaska, Making music for gas money & food, Their Road to Success, “Making Feel It Still”, Getting Permission from The Marvelettes, Zach vs. Sarah Palin, How They Were Exposed to Music Growing Up, Hip Hop & Rock Collaborations, Best Headphones & Sound Quality, MP3 vs. vinyl and a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed! All Butter Soft T's are at: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport. Michael's Book and Audio Book is available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com.rrrrrrreeerrr

item.title: EP 402 - Danny Green (NBA/NCAA Champ) + AIELLO ON JOHN CALIPARI/NFL OFFSEASON RUMBLINGS/NBA PLAYOFFS COMETH/HOLD YOUR HEAD CLAY TRAVIS/SICK F*CKS OTW
item.description: The Gatekeepers of Disruptive Behavior aka The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody are here to kick things off/go Hard Body Karate and discuss: A Stormy Affair on 60 Minutes, Giving Christina Aguilera Shoutout, Wild Wild Country on Netflix, John Calipari Getting Aielloed for not shaking hands after Kentucky’s NCAA Tournament loss, Odell Beckham Jr. Trade Rumors Colin Kaepernick, Johnny Manziel & Eric Reid Seeking Employment in the NFL, The Upcoming NBA Playoffs & The Greatness of LeBron James, Clay Travis - What Are You Doing Duke?, Sick F*cks of the Week & more. Then it’s a tremendous honor to have NBA & NCAA Champion Shooting Guard Danny Green (49:00) (San Antonio Spurs/University of North Carolina) joins Michael Rapaport to discuss: Playing at the University of North Carolina, One and Fone players in college, His long road to San Antonio, Being an elite NBA Shooter, Playing with Tim Duncan, The 2013 & 2014 NBA Finals, learning from LeBron James, Manu Ginobili’s hair, The Kawhi Leonard “meeting”, Athletes & Social Media, Coach Gregg Popovich & a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed. All Butter Soft T's are at: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport. Michael's Book and Audio Book is available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com.

item.title: EP 400 - Matt Barnes: Part Deux (NBA Champ) + DTRUMP GIVES PUTIN A SHOUTOUT/THE REAL HOUSEWIVES OF BOSTON/ZAY JONES HOLD YOUR HEAD/HECKLING IN GOLF
item.description: This is the 400th Episode of Fire! The Gate Keepers of Disruptive Behavior aka The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody are here to discuss: The GMoneti Weather Report, Cynthia Nixon Running for Governor of NY, President Trump Giving President Putin a Shoutout, Ty Lue vs LeBron, upcoming Podcasts, Realhousewives of Boston; Ray Allen Releasing A Book, Zay Jones Hold Your Head, Heckling in Golf & more. Then it’s a tremendous honor to have NBA Champion SF Matt Barnes: Part Deux (19:20) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST (Part One is EP 355) to discuss: Paying College Basketball Players, Bruin Legends, if he wants to coach in the NBA, Helping Young NBA players utilize their brands, Film/TV Projects, Top 5 MCs, The “We Believe” Golden State Warriors, Stan Van Gundy & Dwight Howard, Phil Jackson & Metta World Peace, Defensive Beasts Today, Young Stars, Playoffs vs. Regular Season, Eastern & Western Conference Predictions, Playing Football in High School, his San Francisco 49ers, Colin Kaepernick & a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed! All Butter Soft T's are at: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport. Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com.

item.title: BIRTHDAY EP 399 - Rex Chapman (NBA/Kentucky Wildcats SG) + DISRUPTIVE BEHAVIOR EST 1970/TY LUE STEPS AWAY/THE PAINTINGS OF JIM CARREY/SICK F*CK UPDATE
item.description: It’s his Birthday and he’ll rant if he wants to! Michael Rapaport is going SOLO on that ass to discuss: Being born on March 20, 1970, if he thinks Gerald Moody can dunk, Weezy the I AM RAPAPORT Action News Dog, his diaper cast in 1972, Training, Ty Lue & LeBron James in Cleveland, Jim Carrey’s paintings, Lil Xan not deserving to be threatened, New Suckashit T’s at Districtlines.com/iamrapaport, Coyote Tales, a Sick F*ck Update & more. Then beloved High Flying NBA & Kentucky Wildcats Shooting Guard Rex Chapman (36:06) joins Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: His toughest opponents while at Kentucky, Playing against Bobby Knight, 5 Star Basketball Camp, Derrick Coleman, 2018 March Madness, Next Year’s NBA Rookie of the Year, The Road to the 2018 NBA Championship, Moses Malone, Rick Mahorn, Best Players he faced other than MJ, Magic, Isaiah and a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed! Michael’s Book & Audiobook are at ThisBookHasBalls.com

item.title: FREESTYLE FRIDAY EP 398 - Scot Pollard (NBA Champ/Kansas Jayhawk/Podcaster) + GERALD CLAIMS HE CAN DUNK/TRUMP JR. DIVORCING/SICK F*CKS OF THE WEEK
item.description: The Gate Keepers of Disruptive Behavior aka The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody (1:22) are here to bring things back to basics and Hard Body Karate to discuss: Living Healthy: Michael being on the Mountain & Boxing Gym, Gerald saying he can dunk, Tragedy at FIU Footbridge, Donald Trump Jr. Divorcing, Sick F*cks of the Week & more. Then former NBA Center Scot Pollard (Sacramento Kings/Indiana Pacers/Boston Celtics, etc. (39:56) joins Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss his podcast “Planet Pollard”, Playing at the University of Kansas, Coach Roy Williams, Allen Fieldhouse, Rivalry with Missouri, Paul Pierce, Draft workouts & Shit talking, Guarding Tim Duncan, Kevin Garnett, Charles Barkley, Shaq, Dwight Howard & more. Feelings on Tim Donahy, Being traded to the pacers, Larry Bird, the Malice at the Palace, LeBron James, Kobe Bryant & a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed!

item.title: EP 397 - David Fizdale (2x World Champion NBA Coach/ESPN Analyst) + U.S.A. STUDENTS STAGE A WALKOUT/NFL FREE AGENT TRACKING/SICK F*CKS OF THE WEEK
item.description:
The Gate Keepers of Disruptive Behavior aka The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody (2:12) are here to bring things back to basics and Hard Body Karate to discuss: The Changes in the NFL thus far, Students Across the U.S. Stage A Walkout, Tupac’s Me Against The World Album Turning 23, Turmoil in the White House, Sick F*cks of the Week & more.

Then former 2x World Champion NBA Coach/ESPN Analyst (44:23) joins Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Being Assistant Coach in Miami for the Miami Heatles, “Speaking Coach to a Player and speaking Player to a Coach”, Going Viral whole coaching Memphis in the Playoffs, Coaching for 21 years straight, Watching different coaches offensive systems, The Evolution of Basketball, Dwayne Wade, LeBron James, The Pressure and Competing to Win The Championship, Waking up after winning the Championship, Coaching career, Erik Spolestra, Kobe Bryant, Paul Pierce, Jason Kidd, All Time Trash Talkers, the League being filled with a Generation of Non-Communicators, The Out-GoonYou Squad & a whole lotta mo’! This episode is not to be missed! All Butter Disruptive Behavior Soft T's are at: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport

Plus a Rapapack Member GoFundMe:

https://www.gofundme.com/i-need-to-get-in-to-see-the-dr Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com.

item.title: EP 396 - Tim Howard (USA Soccer GK) + RUDY MANZIEL GETS THAT WILLIE HUTCH TREATMENT/SERENA BEING BACK v VENUS/LEBRON IN LA/OBJ STICKMAN ADVICE
item.description:
The Gate Keepers of Disruptive Behavior aka The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody (2:02) are here to bring things back to basics and Hard Body Karate to discuss: Serena being back and Venus,LeBron losing in Los Angeles, Being a disgruntled Knicks fan,Golden State passing on The White House while the Houston Astros went, March Sadness being full of NYC basketball players, the Odell Beckham Jr. Stickman Tutorial, Rudy Manziel & Mike Stud Get That Willie Hutch Treatment and Gerald Moody Suggests a YouTube Interview show by DJ Kayslay called “What’s The Science”. Then USA Soccer/Colorado Rapids GoalKeeper Tim Howard (44:23) joins Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Being the last line of defense for USA Soccer, The World Cup vs Belgium, How he started playing Soccer, Playing professionally at 18 in New York, Signing with Manchester United at 23 and playing with Cristiano Ronaldo & Wayne Rooney, his Favorite places to play, eat & where to see the world’s most beautiful women live, Top Oh Shit moments, Football/Soccer fan hysteria, Racism in the sport, USA Youth Development, Losing to Trinidad & Tobago and not making the 2018 World Cup, The World’s best teams, Training, Penalty Kicks, Injuries he’s sustained, Tattooing, Tourette’s Syndrome as a youth and today, Mahmoud Abdul Rauf as a hero, his Love of Hip Hop, Top 5 MCs, A Tribe Called Quest, Love for the NBA, Playing for the Colorado Rapids of the MLS this season, If he’s done playing internationally, the USA Soccer Stars to watch & a whole lotta mo’. This episode is not to be missed!

Then Michael Rapaport aka The Bravo Superfan of the Year is joined on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST by Singer & Star of the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills on Bravo, Erika Jayne (33.30) to discuss: 110, 120 & 130 shoes (34.27), The Pressure of Being Erika Jayne & Being Out in the World, Being on 3 Seasons of Real Housewives of Beverly Hills how she got on the show & her Hustle (36.24 ), Watching an episode like everyone else when it debuts, handling fan reactions & other Housewives on social media (46.06), PantyGate & “Cry Face” in Hong Kong, Being a Musician & her influences (52.01), admiring Cardi B, 90s Hip Hop & Top 5 Favorite Rappers, Performing all over the world (01.00.49 ), Her upcoming book, tour & Husband Thomas Girardi, If she's creating a makeup line & Top handbags (01.12.50) Erika wanting to know why Michael watches Real Housewives (01.19.54), other Housewives shows that she watches & a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed & is brought to you by 1-800-FLOWERS - PROMO CODE: BUTTER at 1800Flowers.com & KEEPS at www.Keeps.com/Rapaport. Then Michael is joined by Crazy Legs (B-Boy/Dancer) aka a Pilar of all things Hip Hop Community (26:39) to discuss: His response to the devastation in Puerto Rico with Red Bull & the resiliency of the people (27:28), the first time he saw someone rapping/DJing (37:56), when he realized DJing & Flash Dance blew up (41:09), Hip Hop Today (46:39), Rock Steady/break dancing today (48:54) & more. To donate to the Rock Steady Puerto Rico Relief Effort: https://www.gofundme.com/RSCForLife. Then 3Moneti aka The 3 Time Podcast Co-Host of the Year (Gerald Moody) joins the program rough, rugged and raw (25:27) to discuss: His tumultuous trip back to NYC via JFK Airport (55:03), the Golden Globes Award Show (56:25) Oprah Winfrey, Natalie Portman & smiling while on stage. With final thoughts on the cancellation of Showtime's White Famous (1:08:01) & a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! item.description: In the Cold Open Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo goes in on the 0-16 SkinnyJeanification of some Cleveland Browns fans who are holding a parade to celebrate going winless. This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. Sixers, Warriors v. Cavs) & SkinnyJeanification (20:04), Tattletailing on Twitter (29:54), The Howard Stern Show Fantasy Football League Super Bowl Recap (32:30) & a whole lotta mo'! Then it's a tremendous honor to have New York Knicks Starting Point Guard Jarrett Jack (37:29) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Being out of the NBA/Returning & rehabilitating an injury (38:23), Signing with the Knicks & team camaraderie, The aura of playing in New York and at The Garden, Kristaps Porzingis, mentoring Frank Ntilikina & young teammates, Enes Kanter (42:18), D.C. Basketball (1:01:00), NBA social media thumb thugging (1:03:58), his extensive sneaker collection (1:06:04), The Lonzo Ball Hype (1:11:44), Top Welcome to the NBA moments (1:18:13), Mentoring Draymond Green (1:22:02), The Greatness of Tim Duncan (1:23:29) we Playing against Steve Nash, Penny Hardaway, Stephon Marbury (1:25:11) Golden State Warriors (1:29:31), Playing against Kobe Bryant (1:33:00) Joel Embiid & Trash Talking in Today's NBA (1:35:31), Best Hairline in the NBA (1:37:27) & a whole lotta mo! This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. All Butter Soft T's are at: https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/michael-rapaport. Follow us on Twitter: @MichaelRapaport, @GeraldMoody1560, @iamrapaport, @MilesMDavis, @MrJordanWinter, @BarstoolSports. item.title: EP 361 - Terrell Owens (Future NFL Hall of Fame WR)
item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have 6x Pro & 5x All Pro Wide Receiver Terrell Owens (San Francisco 49ers, Philadelphia Eagles, Dallas Cowboys, etc.) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Being Guarded in the NBA Celebrity All Star Game against Michael (3:36), Dancing with the Stars & staying in shape (7:48), If he could still play in the NFL (14:44), Being a NBA Fan (17:55), Wanting to play in the Big 3 (22:47), The Catch II (33:00), Defending Tony Romo aka “That's My Quarterback” (35:57), Leadership (41:00), Touchdown Celebrations (45:34) Dealing with the Media & Sit-Ups in the Driveway (49:48), Being raised right by Grandma (54:49), Donovan McNabb & other Quarterbacks (1:00:09), Being a 3rd Round Pick & Entering the League (1:04:57), Learning from the Jerry Rice (1:07:33), Best defenders faced (1:09:55), Players & style of play in the NFL today (1:11:37), NFL Hall of Fame (1:21:06), Jerry Jones (1:24:48) & more. This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. All Butter Soft T's are at: https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/michael-rapaport. item.title: EP 360 - Brian Scalabrine (NBA Champ) plus 3MONETI/KO8E24 DAY/JOHN SKIPPER MADE DAN LE BATARD CRY/BALL IN THE FAMILY/SICK F*CKS OTW
item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have Boston Celtics NBA Champion Small Forward & TV Commentator Brian Scalabrine (Nets, Bulls, Celtics) aka The White Mamba (50:18-1:20:23) with Michael Rapaport aka White Mike on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: The Big 3 & Getting Paul Pierce on his team (52:07), going out together in Boston (53:48), the Gordon Hayward Effect (57:12), watching Kyrie Irving nightly & what makes him different (58:21), LeBron & Giannis being the best players that have come to play in Boston this year (1:00:34), The Knicks this Season (1:03:18) Charles Oakley (1:04:42), the Big Man in today's NBA (1:07:05), his favorite player to watch in the NBA (1:09:22), the NBA Rookies that he's seen this year (1:10:43), playing with Jason Kidd & Derrick Rose (1:13:16), the hardest players to guard in the post (1:15:35), playing with Michael Jordan at a Summer Camp for a week (1:16:57), The best player in the MJ, Kobe & LeBron comparison (1:19:04) & more.Before we get into this classic conversation, The Gringo Mandingo aka The Dingo (Michael Rapaport) has some solo things to discuss: The Howard Stern Snow Fantasy Football League (1:47), Kobe Bean Bryant having his Numbers retired (7:00), ESPN President John “The Ripper” Skipper stepping down and Dan Le Batard's CRYing reaction on air (9:58). Then 3Moneti aka The 3 Time Podcast Co-Host of the Year (Gerald Moody) joins the program rough, rugged and raw (25:27) to discuss: Twitter Tales (27:51), Being In Boston with Brian Scalabrine for Jazz vs. Celtics (29:20), Roy Moore (34:40), Keaton Jones GoFundMe Hustle (36:15), Black Thought & a Roots Documentary (37:57), BALL in The Family: Lonzo Ball at MSG, LaMelo Ball's Response to Michael's Video Rant & The Lonzo/LeBron conversation, Charles Barkley on Lavar Ball (1:21:52), Supreme Gear in the NBA (1:35:41), Sick F*cks of the Week (1:38:46) & a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. All Butter Soft T's are at: https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/michael-rapaport. Follow us on Twitter: @MichaelRapaport, @GeraldMoody1560, @iamrapaport, @MilesMDavis, @MrJordanWinter, @BarstoolSports. Follow us on Instagram:@MichaelRapaport, @GMoneti, @iamrapaportpodcast, @MilesMDavis, @JWinter3, @BarstoolSports. item.title: EP 359 - Charlamagne Tha God (Host of The Breakfast Club)
item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have Charlamagne Tha God (3:36) aka Professional Game Spitter, Heavy Hitter Shit Talker & Host of The Breakfast Club (Syndicated Radio & REVOLT TV) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Hardest interviews & how he interviews (4:10), Interviewing Birdman aka “Put Some Respekk On My Name” (9:07), interviewing Kanye West (12:07), Eminem's Music (17:20) his wildest interviews & blowback (19:48), interviewing Hillary Clinton (25:26), his wackiest interviews (31:54), Hip hop palette (34:43, a meeting with Tomi Lauren (41:32), The White House (52:12), predicting Cardi B's rise to fame (56:45), having it out with co-worker DJ Envy (59:28), The Change for Change Project & Colin Kaepernick (1:01:17), his Top 5 MCs (1:05:27), his Future Aspirations (1:10:29) & a whole lotta mo'!Get Charlamagne's Book: Black Privilege: Opportunity Comes to Those Who Create It here - https://www.amazon.com/Black-Privilege-Opportunity-Comes-Create/dp/1501145304. Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. All Butter Soft T's are at: https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/michael-rapaport

item.title: EP 358 - Tyrann Mathieu (Pro Bowl Arizona Cardinals Safety) plus AIELLO ON BULLYING/Z-BO vs. BOOGIE/FIGHTING FANS FROM THE STANDS/Eli Lake Calls In
item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have Pro Bowl Arizona Cardinals Safety Tyrann Mathieu aka The Honey Badger (20:05) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: What he does on off days (20:34), Coaches Bruce Arians & Les Miles (22:45), New Orleans athletes (26:16), New Orleans Hip Hop (27:44), what he's listening to before a game (31:08), Mentoring young professional athletes (32:36), David Johnson (37:34), Patrick Peterson (37:04), Larry Fitzgerald (37:58), having to deal with a major injury (40:20), Trash Talkers (41:58), Fighting in the NFL (43:05) his Welcome to the NFL moment (45:35) & more. Then the Unofficial Official Foreign Political Correspondent Eli Lake of Bloomberg News (47:46) joins Michael Rapaport to discuss: Port Authority Suicide Bomber (47:48), Israel & Why Trump's Decision Was Right (48:36), the Beast's of the NBA East (1:04:16) & more. Before we get into these classic conversations, The Gringo Mandingo aka The Dingo (Michael Rapaport) & Always Ready GMoneti bring it rough, rugged and raw to discuss: The Oxtail Dinner (5:43), The Keaton Jones Saga (7:00), Aiello to Bullies (9:22), Bullying Boogie Cousins (12:07), Fighting the Fans in the NFL (14:06), an Ear Injury in Boxing (16:06), a Fake Sign Language Interpreter (17:00), Upcoming Guests to the Podcast (1:09:14), a label less household (1:10:16), Donald Trump‘s Civil Rights Museum Visit & LeBron James Praise (1:12:02), a Howard Stern Fantasy Football League Prize Request (1:14:36), Duane Reade Zombie Workers (1:16:17) & a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. All Butter Soft T's are at: https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/michael-rapaport. item.title: SMACKER EP 356 - ANTONIO CROMARTIE (4x Pro Bowl NFL CB and All Time Stickman) plus CUSTOMER SERVICE CRACKDOWN/COACH MACADUGYOUROWNGRAVE/SICK F*CKS OTW
item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have 4x NFL Cornerback Antonio Cromartie (27:31) (Chargers, Jets, Cardinals & Colts) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: The Cromartie's Reality TV Show on USA Network (27:55), A 14 child Family schedule (30:08), Vasectomies (31:13), If he still wants to play in the NFL & Being Outspoken (38:10), Thursday Night Games (49:25), Nightmare Wide Receivers to Face (51:47), The Best QBs he Faced (54:22), his Favorite Players Now (55:58) The Biggest Hit he ever took (56:59), Best Trashtalkers he faced (58:02) & more. Before we get into this classic conversation, The Gringo Mandingo aka The Dingo (Michael Rapaport) brings it rough, rugged and raw to discuss: Being a #1 Podcast (2:45), a Customer Service Crackdown (7:14), Going to the St. Johns Basketball Game (11:25), High School in 1981 Brooklyn/Bummy Mike (13:36), Uber Trouble (16:51), a Starbucks Smackdown (26:02), Coach MaCaDugYourOwnGrave (1:02:49), Gronk on that Suckashit (1:05:36), Stern Show Fantasy Football League Update (1:06:02), Celebrity Sexual Allegations (1:08:02), Tiger Woods Has Balls (1:09:59), The Lavar Ball and Co. Saga (1:11:53), The Real Cat Killer (1:15:58), The Chrohn Throne (1:16:35) A Purple Eyed Tattoo Model (1:17:58), Sick F*cks of the week w/ That Wonder bread bag Treatment (1:19:22), The Cyntoia Brown Documentary (1:29:24) & a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. item.title: SHOWCASE EP 354 - Matt Barnes (NBA Champ) plus BIZARRO ELI MANNING
item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have NBA Champion Small Forward Matt Barnes (21:29) with Michael Rapaport on the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST to discuss: Big Men & the NBA (22:38),The Heartbeat of the Golden State Warriors aka Draymond Green (23:38), The Warriors working out behind closed doors (25:56), Klay Thompson's importance (27:30), LeBron James' Greatness (31:37), Marijuana & Testing in the NBA (33:13), Moving from team to team (41:49), Lonzo Ball & LaVar Ball Take (42:58), The Instagramification of Defense (49:29), Being a part of Kevin Durant's journey with the Warriors (50:38), How good Steph Curry is (52:21), The best shooter in the gym (53:47), The 15th man off the bench (55:01), Childhood (57:05), Kobe Bryant (58:12), Guarding LeBron James (1:02:41), Dwayne Wade (1:04:43), Toughest players to guard (1:06:42), How important it is for Rookies to play with Veterans (1:08:11), If he's coming back & the business of basketball (1:10:53), Using his platform for good (1:14:41), Being on the Donald Sterling Clippers (1:18:53) & more.Before we get into this classic conversation, The Gringo Mandingo aka The Dingo (Michael Rapaport) brings it rough, rugged and raw to discuss: Matty Lauer Getting Pinched (3:42), an Impromptu Shame Game (5:34), Aiello stopping by on Ben McAdoo (10:22), Bizarro Eli Manning Calling In (11:19), the Grammy Nominations (15:58) and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! Michael's Book and Audio Book is now available at www.ThisBookHasBalls.com. item.title: EP 353 - Bradley Beal (Washington Wizards SG) plus POST THANKSGIVING THOUGHTS/SEEING SEAN PAYTON/TIGER WOODS GETS THAT LITTLE BEAVER/SICK F*CKS OTW

item.title: EP 348 - Andre Drummond (Detroit Pistons Center) plus STUGOTZ GETS THAT WILLIE HUTCH TREATMENT/LEBRON JAMES TALKS SIDEWAYS/LOUIE C.K. MEETS AIELLO/SICK F*CKS OTW
item.description: In this very special I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST we continue the Major League Podcast Interviews by Michael Rapaport with Andre Drummond, Center from the Detroit Pistons where they discuss: Making music, Favorite Hip Hop Artists, Head Coach Stan Van Gundy, Free Throw Shooting, The Big Galut aka Boban Marjanovic, 3 Point Shooting Big Men, Being Best Friends with Kyrie Irving, The Best Rappers in the NBA, Playing in Downtown Detroit at the New Arena, His Welcome to the NBA moment, Best Trash Talkers in the League & a whole lotta mo' (27:36)!Before we get into this slam dunk conversation between Andre & Michael, The Disco 2 aka The Gringo Mandingo & Always Ready GMoneti bring it rough, rugged and raw to discuss: The 24th Anniversary of A Tribe Called Quest's “Midnight Marauders” & Wu Tang Clan's “36 Chambers” (3:44), Jon Weiner aka Stugotz bragging about making an 8th Grade girl cry so he gets Threatened by Shaq Diesel and That Willie Hutch Treatment (6:18). NBA: LeBron James Talking Out of Pocket about the New York Knicks then riding the subway like he's at Disneyland and Rookie Josh Jackson of the Phoenix Suns whining about the physicality of the NBA (12:18), NFL: about how bad the New York Giants are, Vontaze Burfict not deserving to be ejected and how people shouldn't be taking pictures with O.J. Simpson (21:32). Danny Aiello meeting with Louis C.K. & Bijou Phillips UFUKU (51:50). The Sick F*cks of the Week (58:39). Rachel Dolezeal's black face fantasies (1:10:53) & a more! item.description: It's a tremendous honor to have Julian Edelman aka 2x Super Bowl Winning Wide Receiver for the New England Patriots aka Big Fan of the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST in the NYC Gloomb Tomb Face to Face with Michael Rapaport for an Go r long conversation to discuss Julian's social media video reaction (1:25), his book Relentless: A Memoir (5:15), Upcoming TV Productions (13:30), Top 5 Favorite Films plus a Rocky showdown (17:41), Family heritage (29:52), The Super Bowl Comeback (36:47), Workout & Pre-Practice & Practice Routine (41:28), Having Matt Patricia & His Pencil's Backplus if Coach Belichick uses one too (47:43), Getting Hit By Cam Chancellor in Super Bowl XLIX plus and Worst Ways to Get Tackled (50:45), Players Julian Loved Growing Up plus Today's Wide Receivers He Enjoys Watching (54:45), The Pros & Cons of Fantasy Football (59:33) and a whole lotta mo'! item.title: LIVE IN NYC EP 345 - Artie Lange (Comedian/Actor/Podcaster)
item.description: Dedicated to those who lost their lives in Downtown NYC and those affected.Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody are BACK! LIVE in NYC at The Gramercy Theatre for the 2017 Homecoming. Joined on stage by comedian Artie Lange (Crashing, Dirty Work, Beer League, The Artie & Anthony Show)(27:30) to discuss:-Swimming-The PC Police-Comics Having To Stop Performing at Colleges-An incident with Colin Quinn-Kevin Spacey & Harvey Weinstein-Getting Parts in Hollywood-“Kiss of Death”-HBO's “Crashing”-“Dirty Work”-Spending 3 Months in LA County Jail & a whole lotta mo'!The Disco 2 come at you to discuss:-Tiger Woods Being Back-Anthony Weiner Getting That Wonder Bread Bag Treatment -Sick F*cks of the Week-A No Good Judge-A Stickman Being Put Out To Pasture-Patrick Beverlying-LeBron Wishing Lonzo Happy Birthday-Q&A about:Cat Killing, Wanting To Interview Jared Kushner, Justified, Prison Break, 2nd Season or The Big 3 with Metta World Peace, O.J. Simpson's White Girl Syndrome, Talking Knicks with @_TheLoopyBlogger_ (on Instagram), Dan LeBatard, Best Part About Joining Barstool Sports & more.-PLUS a Wille Hutch for a fan who's wildin' & a whole lotta mo'! item.title: EP 344 - BEST OF STICKMEN: VOLUME 1
item.description: It all started on the set of Copland. “You know Burgess Meredith was a stickman” - Sylvester Stallone said to Michael Rapaport. This Best Of Stickmen: Volume 1 is a look back at the best conversations about the true blue cocksmen who deserve recognition. A Stickman goes about their business with class and decency. Names that embody the term are Derek Jeter, Leonardo DiCaprio, Peter O'Toole and more. Michael brought this term into the public lexicon and now joined by Co-Host Gerald Moody, featuring special guests Ryan Ruocco & Schwab Kemp, this episode will be showcased in the Hugh Hefner “Stickmen Hall of Fame. item.content:encoded: It all started on the set of Copland. “You know Burgess Meredith was a stickman” - Sylvester Stallone said to Michael Rapaport. item.title: LE BATARD and ESPN PODCAST DISS TRACK EP 269 RE-RELEASE - COMING FOR THE COMPANY MEN
item.description: With the abrupt cancellation of our Barstool brethren's Barstool Van Talk by ESPN we had to re-release the first ever Podcast Diss Track. If you want to try and defame the name of our friends and Michael Rapaport, you're sorely mistaken. Joined for the first time by I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST Producer Jordan Winter to break down the how Michael disagreeing with Dan Le Batard's views on the Los Angeles Lakers hiring Magic Johnson as the President of Basketball Operations lead to his "producers" taking offense. They want beef. We want action. The slandering of The Gringo Mandingo on Twitter and subsequently on Monday's Dan Le Batard show by The Cupcake Kid, Jon Weiner aka The Yes Man of Long Island and the Coffee Boys of Miami is all well and good but now it's time to hear it from the WORLDWIDE PHENOMENON. This episode is not to be missed! One week from Today! LIVE I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST & THIS BOOK HAS BALLS BOOK SIGNING in New York City, Monday October 30th at 9 PM! item.description: Michael Rapaport is back from Las Vegas to share his Championship Weekend experience with the 2015 & 2016 Podcast Co-Host of the Year aka Gerald Moody and The Rapapack. Sit back and enjoy the wild ride as The Disco 2 discuss: The Big 3 Championship Mayweather vs. McGregor aka Hong Kong Phooey McGregor's trash talk Michael's History of rooting against Mayweather Boxing vs. MMA If Mayweather had lost Michael's full Vegas experience Going to Mayweather's training camp 4th Row Fight Night with Barstool Sports' Dave Portnoy aka El Presidente Getting to chill with the Pardon My Take Team aka Big Cat & PFT Commenter The Denzel Room aka The Celebrity Room McGregor fans sliding into Michael's DMs & a whole lotta mo'! item.title: EP 322 - NEW SEAN PRICE ALBUM/CALLING OUT NYC HIP HOP RADIO/SELF PROCLAIMED STICKMAN IN BOSTON/DR. AIELLO/DURESS MOCK DRAFTING/SICK F*CKS OF THE WEEK
item.description: Spitting that fire from top to bottom it's Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo and Gerald Moody aka Always Ready GMoneti coming to you live from the LA Gloom Tomb. The new posthumous "Imperius Rex" album by Sean Price is a banger (Available on iTunes: https://itun.es/us/1wmUkb) and we have some of it to play for you. Michael and Gerald want to see the voices of NYC Hip Hop Radio play these tracks if that's where Hip Hop Lives, not where it died. Then for the fun and games, The Disco 2 discuss: Boston Red Sox Pitcher Chris Sale calling himself a Stickman Men sealing their Loaf tips An Instagram man honoring his heavyset wife Doctors accused of Fat Shaming Dr. Aiello stopping by Allegedly Terrible Lisa Bloom Accused Usher Planned fan Kaepernick protests at NFL Headquarters Serena being Mom shamed shaming Murder Doc and Chill T's The Kylie Jenner Suit Duress mock drafting at the gym Sick F*cks of the Week The Backyard pool challenge and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! Next Live Podcast: August 20th, 2017 - Gillette Stadium in Foxboro, MA! For early bird ticket prices starting at $59 go to DancewithTheDingo.com PROMO CODE: DINGO to get an additional $15 OFF. item.title: EP 321 - LENA DUNHAM THE SOAPBOX LIAR/DAN LEBETARDS EBT PRODUCERS/SICK F*CKS/YOUNG SHOOTER
item.description: Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody are both Live and direct from The L.A. Gloom Tomb! Michael discusses almost having to pull a Jeff Van Gundy during a confrontation at the Big 3 in Kentucky on Sunday. Then the Disco Two take the gloves off for a discussion about Lena Dunham and her troubles with telling the truth. Then, in what some podcast experts are calling the rant of the year, Michael addresses Dan Lebatard and his crew of slander artists. We got sick fucks, we got the Young Shooter and G Moneti on the same podcast for the FIRST TIME EVER. Enjoy this historical episode of the I Am Rapport: Stereo Podcast Next Live Podcast: August 20th, 2017 - Gillette Stadium in Foxboro, MA! For early bird ticket prices go to DancewithTheDingo.com for and use the PROMO CODE: DINGO to get $15 OFF. Matthew Berry, Trey Wingo, Jim Breuer and Rob Gronkowski! Drills on the same field as the defending champs Meet & Greet Fantasy Advice Live Duress Mock Drafts A suite to have a Fantasy League Draft with your friends and more! item.title: EMERGENCY EP 319 - STERN SHOW FANTASY FOOTBALL COLLUSION/SHAME ON THE NFL FOR BLACKBALLING COLIN KAEPERNICK/BOOK and NEW PODCAST ANNOUNCEMENT
item.description: Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo was startled early in the morning by The Howard Stern Show producers wanting him to call in to the show. Little did he know that it was an ambush of the highest regard. Rapaport'sDelight aka There Will Be Blood aka That Things Big DOMINATED the Fantasy Football regular season, winning first place by 300 points and earning a bye heading into the playoffs while beating everyone in the league at least. Now there's been a ruling that all celebrities are out of the league and Michael has to reapply to get back in. The Dingo sounds off on that then gets in to the disgrace that is Colin Kaepernick does not have a job in the NFL and that the Baltimore Ravens owner is resistant to signing him. This is a rant heavy emergency episode that is not to be missed! item.title: SCARAMUCCI EMERGENCY EP 317 - @B*******B**C** (P***** ** ****)
item.description: With new White House Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci unleashing an almost unbelievable on the record interview with The New Yorker, the moral compass aka The I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST is here to set the record straight. The Gringo Mandingo aka Michael Rapaport and Big Cat aka @B*******B**C** of powerhouse podcast P***** ** **** dissect the interview heard around the world with quotes galore, No Facts Checked before getting into Kyrie coming to the Knicks and Michael's voice. Then acclaimed actor Michael Rapaport does a reading of the Scaramucci script and creates the #MoochChallenge for all actors. Finally Co-Host Gerald Moody chimes in to defend The Long Island Mooch. This episode is not to be missed! The mind blowing live show in Dallas, Texas this Saturday Night at 8 PM with Special Guests: Gary Payton, Rashard Lewis, DeShawn Stevenson, Brian Scalabrine, Jimmy Jackson, Stephen Jackson, along with Kenyon Martin, Gerald Moody, Michael Rapaport & more - Tickets at iamrapaporttour.com BRAND NEW Butter Soft T's at: https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/michael-rapaport Jul 29 2017 - Texas Theatre - Dallas, TX http://ticketf.ly/2spaKP9 August 20th, 2017 - Gillette Stadium - DancewithTheDingo.com for early bird ticket prices and use my PROMO CODE DINGO to get $15 OFF Ticket packages can get you: Drills on the same field as the defending champs Live Duress Mock Drafts A suite to have a Fantasy League Draft with your friends and more! item.description: Michael Rapaport is back from the Beverly Hills Ear, Nose & Throat Doctor to talk sh*t along with Always Ready GMoneti. The voice hasn't been strong but Michael is so happy for all the love on the road from The Rapapack at Big 3 events and can't wait to see you all this week in Philadelphia. Before they get into it, Stan Van Gundy stops by to discuss his most recent escapades. The Disco 2 then gets into the Mayweather vs. McGregor first press conference, "Celebrity Lawyer" Lisa Bloom aka Crooked Lisa You F*ck You, the Sick F*cks of the Week, the pretty boy convict, Up and Coming STICKMEN, a Kardashian dish track, a No Good Judge, Trouble In The Air, the defacing of Prodigy's mural, being on That Aaron Pryor and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! item.title: EMERGENCY EP 309 - KENYON MARTIN AND BRIAN SCALABRINE aka THE WHITE MAMBA ON LIFE AFTER PHIL JACKSON/SUPERTEAMIFICATION OF THE NBA/THE BIG 3 WEEK 2
item.description: It's a Two Man Weave that with Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin (Nets, Nuggets, Knicks) that becomes a Three Man Weave once Brian Scalabrine (Nets, Bulls, Celtics) calls in with contributions from Producer Jordan Winter (1/2 of The Dust Brothers). Discussed in this episode are all things Phil Jackson and the New York Knicks parting ways, what they should do next, Chris Paul being dealt to the Rockets, the future of the Clippers, and being impressed by the Kings' draft before being joined by The White Mamba to talk Big 3, Boston Celtics, Big 3, wardrobe and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! Download the SeatGeek App for tickets to your favorite live events and use the PROMO CODE: BUTTER for $10 OFF your first purchase. Do you have the balls to come dance with the Dingo? August 20th, 2017 - Gillette Stadium - FantasySportsFest.com for early bird ticket prices and use my PROMO CODE DINGO to get $10 OFF This is the Official Kickoff to the fantasy football season and as my gift to you, they'll be a live I AM RAPAPORT PODCAST with Jim Breuer, Trey Wingo & other VERY special guests to be announced. Ticket packages can get you: Drills on the same field as the defending champs Behind-the-scenes access at Gillette Stadium Food/Drink Packages Live Duress Mock Drafts A suite to have a League Draft with your friends and more! Restrictions may apply. Promo ends August 20th, 2017. See website for further details. item.description: With the cold open the Official Unofficial Political Correspondent Eli Lake calls in to breakdown what is really going on in Washington D.C. with Mr. White Folks & Gmoneti What President Trump has done right and wrong so far in office, the firing of FBI Director James Comey and what will end up being the Super Bowl of Congressional hearings. Then with The Disco 2 Back from the Great Northwhite Tour, Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo and the Black Ed McMahon discuss NBA Skinnyjeanification with John Wall getting bounced from the playoffs after standing on the scorers table post Game 6, James Harden's potential point shaving, Allen Iverson's style in the 90's, The NBA Lottery, Lonzo Ball being shipped to Siberia, Steph Curry playing possum, Super Sperm Antonio Cromartie, the making of a Stickman, bashing Bill Cosby, the return of Wigga Please, Brad Pitt the A-Lister, Gerald's message to Gabourey Sidibe Starbucks Protesters, cleaning out Confederate statues and a whole lotta mo'! item.title: EP 294 - SOLD OUT IN SEATTE w/ SHAWN KEMP ft. ADAM RAY
item.description: Michael Rapaport and Gerald Moody perform LIVE from The Triple Door in Seattle, Washington in front of a capacity crowd joined by All Star NBA player Shawn Kemp (Seattle SuperSonics) and our comedian sideline reporter correspondent, Seattle's own Adam Ray (About Last Night Podcast). This will go down as a night that Seattle will never forget and straight into the Podcast Hall of Fame. First Adam comes out to set the Seattle tone, then Michael & Gerald bring it Hard Body Karate before bringing out Shawn Kemp for a rim rocking interview about the Sonics Drafting Gary Payton, being mentored by Xavier McDaniel, battling NBA legends like Malone, Hakeem & Jordan, predicting a woman playing in the NBA, the first time he dunked in the NBA, his favorite dunks, giving back to the community, the guy whose teeth he wanted to knock out most in the league and a whole lotta mo' before we open up to the floor to the fans. This episode is not to be missed! Saturday night 5/13 in VANCOUVER at 8:30 PM. Tickets are available at www.iamrapaporttour.com The Two Man Weave is Live on the TuneIn Radio App with Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin every Wednesday from 5-7 PM EST. item.title: EP 288 - SAM CASSELL
item.description: Michael Rapaport sits down with 2 Time NBA Champion (Houston Rockets) and current NBA Assistant Coach (LA Clippers), the one and only Sam Cassell. Before getting into it, Michael has to get s few things off of his chest about the NBA playoffs and the debacle that is the New York Knicks as an appetizer. Now on to the main course with Sam, which is one of our best interviews yet! Michael and Sam discuss Playoff time, the LA Clippers and that feeling he has about this year, dealing with injuries, the 1993 NBA FINALS, Hakeem the Dream, Scott Brooks, Vernon Maxwell, the old NBA with guys not liking each other, Skinnyjeanification, the best old school sh*t talkers, growing up in Baltimore, DMV ballers, Len Bias, Mugsey Bouges, going to Junior College before Florida State, bring Junior college player of the year, becoming a young man in Tallahassee, playing against Kenny Anderson and Bobby Hurley in high school, playing in the ACC conference, One and done players, coaching John wall out of college, Michael Cage hitting him so hard he saw stars, War vs the 90s Knicks, the OJ CHASE- Game 4, Patrick Ewing coaching Georgetown, the Charles Oakley situation, strongest former players, most under appreciated former players, playing with Steve Nash as a rookie, success in college translating to the pros, mentoring John Wall, Bradley Beal and Austin Rivers, 16 years in the NBA, Ping Pong and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! item.title: EP 287 - JAMAL CRAWFORD
item.description: Michael Rapaport sits down with Jamal Crawford (LA CLIPPERS Guard) to discuss Jamal's internet stopping late season move against the Houston Rockets, how he comes up with some of his moves, which players have handles like he does, how the Point Guard position has evolved, big men shooting 3s, being a one and done college player, today's NBA due to the Internet, worshiping Allen Iverson, being such a fan of playing in the NBA and playing his idols, never practicing in a drill, playing against Latrell Sprewell, Kobe & Shaq, Allen Iverson, Hip Hop, Top 5 MCs, favorite groups, Seattle ballers, being best friends with Isaiah Thomas and his prediction prediction for him in Boston, The Supersonics in Seattle, playing with Shawn Kemp and Gary Payton at 16, a showdown with Gary, All NBA Trash Talk Team, Michael Jordan stories, meeting Jay Z, the New York Knicks, playing in Madison Square Garden, Top Knicks stories, the Charles Oakley situation live and having him as a mentor, the NBA Playoffs coming up, the LA Clippers flying under the radar, peaking at the right time, 6th Man of the Year competition, a social media driven world, giving out the MVP trophy 2 months after the season, how impressive what Russell Westbrook did this season is, All NBA team of All Time, how many years Jamal has left, showing up at LA Fitness and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! item.description: This is a (worldwide) phenomenal interview. item.title: EP 281 - BLAKE GRIFFIN - GAME WORN SNEAKERS AUCTION - DESIGNED BY 11 YEAR OLD JUSTICE GRIFFITH FOR CHLA aka CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL LOS ANGELES
item.description: Michael Rapaport and the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST went to LA Clippers vs. Washington Wizards at Staples Center on March 29th for a very special reason. This episode is brought to you by Children's Hospital Los Angeles (CHLA), LA Clippers, Blake Griffin & MeUndies. 11 Year Old Justice Griffith, a former patient at CHLA was chosen to design a Jordan Brand sneaker that was worn in game by Blake Griffin (where he had 26 Points, 10 Rebounds, 9 Assists and got the Win). These magical shoes are now up for auction with all proceeds going to CHLA: www.Clippers.com/auction We are joined by Justice Griffith, his Mother, Father & Dawn Wilcox from CHLA before being joined by All Star LA CLIPPERS POWER FORWARD BLAKE GRIFFIN to discuss working with kids, teaming up with Justice to design the shoes, CHLA, movies he's seen recently, favorite TV shows and how you can also donate by texting: MARCH to 91999 or visiting MakeMarchMatter.org. This episode is not to be missed! Get 20% OFF any MeUndies gear for the Clippers playoff run by using www.MeUndies.com/Clippers

item.description: The Disco 2 aka Michael Rapaport and Gerald Moody come in hot in an eclectic and emergency segment filled I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST. First The Malachi Crunch discuss the Sick F*ck of the Week along with Gerald's documentary recommendation and reaction. Then Joy Taylor (Host of FS1's Undisputed with Skip and Shannon & member of The Rapapack) calls in to to discuss a Women's Head Coach in the NBA, Fantasy Football action, hosting Undisputed, Lavar Ball & more! item.title: EP 278 - CARON BUTLER aka Tuff Juice
item.description: Recorded LIVE in front of a packed crowd at TuneIn Studios in Austin, TX! Michael Rapaport sits down with former NBA All Star Caron Butler (Heat, Lakers, Wizards, Mavs, etc.) to discuss his fondest NCAA Tournament memories at UCONN, the top NBA players he's played with, Halle Berry shouting him out on The Tonight Show, playing with/against Kobe Bryant, guarding LeBron James, Gilbert Arenas, the 2011 NBA championship with the Dallas Mavericks, best locker rooms, averaging a triple double, lunchpail teams, dueling Van Gundy's, NBA dress code, his friendship with Dwayne Wade, being traded for Shaq, getting incarcerated at 15, playing basketball in prison for food, having a movie about his book/life being produced by Mark Wahlberg and a whole lotta mo'! This episode, especially for NBA fans is not to be missed! Pick up a copy of Caron's book "Tuff Juice: My Journey From The Streets To The NBA" here: https://www.amazon.com/Tuff-Juice-Journey-Streets-NBA/dp/1493011421 The Two Man Weave is Live on the TuneIn Radio App with Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin every Wednesday from 5-7 PM EST. Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo and Gerald Moody aka The Black Ed McMahon are in the building with our Special Guests plus an electric Rapapack crowd to discuss: The SkinnyJeanification of the NBA, how much Kenyon spent per year on his wardrobe, how Mia became a worldwide phenomenon, groupies & stalkers, Mia's brand moving forward, the Dallas Cowboys and a whole lotta mo'! item.title: EP 274 - BRANDON MARSHALL (New York Giants)
item.description: Michael Rapaport and the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST welcome back Brandon Marshall, the newest Wide Receiver of the New York Giants for an episode that no NYG fan & NFL fan should miss. They discuss Brandon's excitement, leaving behind the New York Jets, fitting in with the New York Giants receiving core including Odell Beckham Jr., preparing for the upcoming season, overcomplicating the game, Eli Manning's work ethic, growing as a player while dealing with mental health issues, sports science, walking into another man's locker room, the Michael Strahan & Bryant Gumbel blueprint, reporting on real news, Brandon's bet with Antonio Brown, off season training regimen & a whole lotta mo'! item.title: DISS TRACK EP 269 - MICHAEL RAPAPORT WANTS THAT ACTION FROM THE CUPCAKE KID AKA DAN LE BATARD AND HIS CRONIES
item.description: If you want to try and defame the name of Michael Rapaport, you're sorely mistaken if you think he's going to back down. Joined for the first time by I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST Producer Jordan Winter to break down the how Michael disagreeing with Dan Le Batard's views on the Los Angeles Lakers hiring Magic Johnson as the President of Basketball Operations lead to his "producers" taking offense. They want beef. We want action. The slandering of The Gringo Mandingo on Twitter and subsequently on Monday's Dan Le Batard show by The Cupcake Kid, Jon Weiner aka The Yes Man of Long Island and the Coffee Boys of Miami is all well and good but now it's time to hear it from the WORLDWIDE PHENOMENON. This episode is not to be missed! Soft Ass T's and Hoodies are available! item.title: EP 267 - KENYON MARTIN
item.description: Michael Rapaport and Kenyon Martin (New Jersey Nets, Denver Nuggets, etc.) go 1 on 1 for the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST for one of the best NBA conversations of the year. Michael declares Kenyon an All Goon Squad member and they discuss Charles Oakley, Kenyon's exit meeting with Phil Jackson while on the Knicks, how to build around Carmelo, why Derek Fisher failed, playing for the Denver Nuggets with JR Smith, Carmelo Anthony and George Karl, Basketball IQ, Kenyon Martin Jr. being a basketball top prospect, Nuggets vs. Knicks brawl in 2006, Wanting all Action, 2009 Western Conference Finals against the Lakers, Facing Kobe Bryant, Top 5 players Kenyon was never teammates with, Playing against Tim Duncan, Playing with Allen Iverson, George Karl's book and a whole lotta mo'! item.title: ALL STAR MINI EP 265 - JUSTIN HOLIDAY
item.description: New York Knicks SG Justin Holiday joins Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin LIVE from ALL STAR WEEKEND in NEW ORLEANS in The Two Man Weave on TuneIn. The Controversial Front Court is also joined by NBATV & NBA on TuneIn's Rick "The Stick" Kamla for a Four Man Weave! Discussed in this phenomenal podcast is how the last few weeks have been on the Knicks, being in a basketball family, having a brother that plays in New Orleans, Kristaps Porzingis winning the skills competition, Justin's road to the NBA, who should be the #1 Overall pick between Lonzo Ball & Markelle Fultz, fake KMart and finished off by the topic that's going to sweep the Nation: Ball Family vs. Holiday Family Charity Matchup - $1 Million Goes to Charity. This episode is not to be missed! Check out The Two Man Weave Live on TuneIn Radio App with Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin every Wednesday from 5-7 PM EST. item.content:encoded: New York Knicks SG Justin Holiday joins Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin LIVE from ALL STAR WEEKEND in NEW ORLEANS in The Two Man Weave on TuneIn. The Controversial Front Court is also joined by NBATV & NBA on TuneIn's Rick "The Stick" Kamla for a Four Man Weave! Discussed in this phenomenal podcast is how the last few weeks have been on the Knicks, being in a basketball family, having a brother that plays in New Orleans, Kristaps Porzingis winning the skills competition, Justin's road to the NBA, who should be the #1 Overall pick between Lonzo Ball & Markelle Fultz, fake KMart and finished off by the topic that's going to sweep the Nation: Ball Family vs. Holiday Family Charity Matchup - $1 Million Goes to Charity. This episode is not to be missed! Check out The Two Man Weave Live on TuneIn Radio App with Michael Rapaport & Kenyon Martin every Wednesday from 5-7 PM EST. item.title: EP 260 - DOC RIVERS
item.description: We are happy to announce The I AM RAPAPORT PODCAST is proud to partner with the LA Clippers on a digital content initiative that's first of its kind in the NBA. The Clippers are opening their doors to the I AM RAPAPORT crew to cover the team in their own unique style with no limits. Our goal is to cover the team in a different style from any other form of "traditional" media. We are kicking it off in Utah and are so happy to be joined by Head Coach and Team President Doc Rivers. Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody ask Doc about growing up in Chicago, playing with Isaiah Thomas, Mark Aguirre, Terry Cummings and more, playing against NBA players as a high schooler, present day NBA player handshakes, making the Atlanta Hawks without a guaranteed contract, weightlifting in the NBA, The Charles Oakley Game, The 1992 Knicks, Pat Riley's rules, Kevin Garnett and his role with the LA Clippers, Guarding Michael Jordan, Larry Bird being the biggest trash talker in the league, Coaches that influenced him, Game Day preparations, the best shooter he's seen, where he got the nickname Doc and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! For all archived episodes & more please visit the new and improved: www.iamrapaport.com I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST LIVE! New Orleans, LA - Saturday February 18th @ 5:30 PM - The Joy Theater - For tickets: http://www.thejoytheater.com/news/upcoming-events/i-am-rapaport-stereo-podcast Soft Ass T's and Hoodies are available! Please visit: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport Subscribe to the I AM RAPAPORT YouTube Channel at www.YouTube.com/iamrapaport Show love! Subscribe, Rate and Review the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST on iTunes. Tell a friend to tell a friend! item.title: MY SOURCES! EP 259 - CHRIS BROUSSARD
item.description: Michael Rapaport has a hangover from the Oakley Situation just like all New Yorkers (and the snow blizzard which is now called Hurricane Oakley) and is joined by FS1 Analyst and NBA Insider Chris Broussard (Host of In The Zone with Chris Broussard Podcast) to discuss who MY SOURCES! are, Michael's impression of Chris, how the Knicks situation can be improved, Phil Jackson (his ego) & Carmelo Anthony (if he will remain with the Knicks), what the Cavs should do this season, LeBron Blames thriving in adversity/creating drama, the next NBA Superstar, who the Knicks should be targeting in Free Agency, who is going to win the 2016-17 NBA Finals and a whole lotto mo'! This episode is not to be missed! For all archived episodes & more please visit the new and improved: www.iamrapaport.com I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST LIVE! item.description: Michael Rapaport aka Die Hard Knicks Fan and Director of "When The Garden Was Eden" ESPN 30 for 30, sounds off on the scene that unfolded at Madison Square Garden during the Clippers vs. Knicks game where in the 1st Quarter, former Knick Charles Oakley was arrested live on TV. item.title: EP 257 - LEBRON BLAMES MESSY DIAPER/PATS AND THE WHITE HOUSE/SVG/BITERS BITE/SICK F*CKS OTW/SNL ON POINT/NEW ORLEANS LIVE SHOW/BOYCOTTING THE GRAMMYS
item.description: A begrudging Congratulations to the New England Patriots and their fans for winning the 2016-2017 NFL Championship. Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo comes out firing off the top with an ice cold open about LeBron James' antics in the media and New England Patriots Players skipping the White House with a little help from Stan Van Gundy. Then the 2015 & 2016 Podcast Co-Host of the Year Gerald Moody (Last Name Rhymes with Doody) calls in to discuss other podcasts biting our style, The Super Bowl, the Cavs coming back to the Garden, Knicks fans booing Carmelo Anthony, SICK F*CKS OF THE WEEK, heading to New Orleans for 2017 NBA ALL STAR WEEKEND, Saturday Night Live having the attention of the White House, Donald Trump's Walk of Fame Star, Terrell Owens being denied the Hall of Fame, artists boycotting the Grammys and not respecting those who came before them, Odell Beckham at the Pro Bowl Skills Challenge, a shout out to the film Hidden Figures and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! For all archived episodes & more please visit the new and improved: www.iamrapaport.com I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST LIVE! New Orleans, LA - Saturday February 18th @ 5:30 PM - The Joy Theater - For tickets: http://www.thejoytheater.com/news/upcoming-events/i-am-rapaport-stereo-podcast Soft Ass T's and Hoodies are available! Please visit: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport Subscribe to the I AM RAPAPORT YouTube Channel at www.YouTube.com/iamrapaport Show love! item.title: EP 256 - RON PERLMAN
item.description: Actors Ron Perlman (Hellboy, Sons of Anarchy, Hand of God, etc.) and Michael Rapaport sit down for a SIGNATURE SERIES interview to discuss the actors that Ron looks up to, growing up in Washington Heights, feeling invisible during his career, meeting/working with Director Guillermo del Toro (and the letter he wrote Ron before they met), collaborating on sets with directors in Film & TV, Hellboy 3, working on Sons of Anarchy, being in the presence of Brando, Sinatra, Mantle & Connery, Ron Pearlman 2020, Ron's Book, Danny Aiello and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! item.title: EP 255 - TELEPHONE A TROLL 2/THE YOUNG SHOOTER CHRONICLES/RAW DOG WITH A BAG/GERALD GETS A PHYSICAL/SUPER BOWL SUNDAY/LAURYN HILL PLAY THE SUBWAY
item.description: Happy Black History Month. We salute Black American Culture. The I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST is coming to you live and direct from Los Angeles, California with Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo, the Young Shooter Dean Collins and joined by the 2015 & 2016 Podcast Co-Host of the Year later on. Michael and Dean made an Instagram video from set of Michael coughing and a Troll popped off, so Michael asked him to call in, for the 2nd time in the history of the WORLDWIDE PHENOMENON. Before diving into that, Michael & Dean discuss: @MikeRapaportson in the news "The Witness" on NetflixYoung Shooter going Raw Dog with A BagGetting Ghosted Then: TELEPHONE A TROLL 2 Followed by Michael and Gerald talking about: G Moody finally getting a physical Michael wanting to root for the Patriots but can't Wondering why anyone cares about Roger Goodell Jerry Rice's Chicken Wing Commercial Lauryn Hill being hours late to her own concert again Madonna visiting Africa like it's Nordstrom's & a whole lotta mo'! Including the first time Gerald and Dean speaking on the podcast, with Dean having a question for G Moody, Last Name Rhymes with Doody. This episode is not to be missed! For all archived episodes & more please visit the new and improved: www.iamrapaport.com Soft Ass T's and Hoodies are available! item.description: This I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST is NBA Heaven with Michael Rapaport aka Bird & World Champion Stephen Jackson aka Captain Jack (Spurs, Pacers, Warriors & more) and YOU the fans, calling in. Recorded live at TuneIn Studios in Venice, CA. Topics discussed are: Ice Cube's Big 3 on 3 LeagueNew York Knicks Drama with Phil Jackson and Carmelo Anthony The relationship between player and mediaLeBron James' posse and speaking because he knows people listen Cavaliers vs WarriorsNot leaving the league on his own terms San Antonio success and frustration with Gregg PoppovichThe All Star GameFans call inChicago Bulls Drama with Rajon Rondo, Dwayne Wade & Jimmy ButlerPlayers not caring Chandler Parsons being a punk Captain Jack's best teammates2007 Golden State Warriors & Having Dirk's numberDrinking Scotch with Don NelsonMarijuana in the NBA Favorite players to guard Wanting to be a great defenderInstagram culture in basketball The best dunk Stephen has seen & a whole lotta mo'! item.title: PRESIDENT OBAMA IS GOING OUT ON HIS SHIELD/TRUMP WANTS IN/FAMOUS WHITE PEOPLE WITH NO LIPS/WIGGA PLEASE - THROWBACK NO FACTS CHECKED THURSDAY EP 62
item.description: This is Episode 62! A THROWBACK NO FACTS CHECKED MONSTER and NO ONE is safe. Michael is happy for the gay & lesbian community having marriage legalized in all 50 states! He introduces them to terms that they're going to need to get used to now that marriage is legal in all 50 states. Michael lauds Pres. Obama for going out on his shield as his presidency nears an end and for saying "the N-Word" on Marc Maron's WTF Podcast. item.description: When the chips are down, Michael Rapaport is at his best. Losing in the Howard Stern Fantasy Football League, Michael has a cold open message for the members of the league talking greasy. Then he is joined by the 2015 & 2016 Podcast Co-Host of the Year Gerald Moody Last Name Rhymes with Doody to discuss Todd Gurley coming at a fan, Michael attending the Bernard Hopkins fight Saturday Night at The Forum, wall mounting the man who killed Cecil the Lion, Donald Trump is officially voted the President, Dylan Roof being the official sex toy of the prison systems, Slate Magazine shaming Mick Jagger having a kid at 73, 60% of NBA players going broke 5 years after leaving the league, The Sick F*cks of the Week, speaking on behalf of black people worldwide about Lil Kim, All Loafs Matter, Brownsville Gardens, the perils of White Girl Syndrome, Plants Feeling Pain, Horning the man who wears Goat horns and a whole lotta mo'! This episode is not to be missed! New SOFT ASS T's are now available! Please visit: www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport To be a part of the I AM RAPAPORT League please visit www.DraftKings.com/iamrapaport. Create your own contests or Dance with the Dingo 1 on 1. Show love! Subscribe, Rate and Review the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST on iTunes. Tell a friend to tell a friend! item.title: EP 241 - THAT'LL GET YA BENCHED EXTRAVAGANZA! - FFF 14
item.description: Week 14 in the NFL was wet and wild as the Fantasy Football Playoffs kicked off. Michael Rapaport breaks down his war of words in the Howard Stern Fantasy Football League, the self destruction of The Monkey, coming after The Traitor Will Murray in this week's matchup and hoping that Jason Kaplan is next in The Pig Roast. Also the JewRu aka Michael hosted The DraftKings Fantasy Football World Championships in NYC where $10M in Prizes were given away to the qualifiers and breaks down what it's like at the top of the mountain top of Fantasy Football. Then is the longest ever segment that's sweeping the nation: "That'll Get Ya Benched" in Sports and the World(wide Phenomenon) at large. Everybody's getting benched. This episode is not to be missed! Recorded in front of a capacity live audience of Rapapack faithful we discuss music, sports, film, current events, The Sick F*ck and open up the floor to a Q & A like always and the crowdy gets rowdy. item.description: Week 13 in the NFL was SMASHMOUTH FANTASY FOOTBALL with RapaportsDelight going 2-1 in League play heading to the playoffs. Michael breaks down his war against The Gorilla, traveling to San Diego to watch Bucs vs. Chargers and his fantasy playoff picture. Up next is the segment that's sweeping the nation: "That'll Get Ya Benched" followed by a rundown of a heavy rivalry week in the NFL before helping you "Break The Bank". Michael gives shoutouts to those he beat and the players that beat him this week at DraftKings.com/iamrapaport aka RapaportsDelight. This episode is not to be missed! item.description: Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo & Gerald Moody aka The Black Ed McMahon bring the fire and desire to podcasting once again. Gerald kicks it off speaking on attending Masta Ace's 50th Birthday party with legends and the mistrial in the case of Walter Scott, then we get into it. Calling out the Sick F*cks of the Week, Addressing Matt Barnes & Boogie Cousins after hours NYC altercation, Teachers and Students Freaking Off, asking Where is Rachel Dozeal?, the Gentrification of Racism, Fran Tarkenton talks nonsense, Madonna hanging on to fame, No Means No for Dog's too, Ben Carson being in charge of Housing in the U.S., traveling to San Diego to watch Big Mike Evans, A Good Judge, Aielloing Odell Beckham and a whole lotta mo'! item.title: EP 235 - STERNFL BREAKDOWN/THAT'LL GET YA BENCHED/THAT'LL GET YA SNAPS/BREAK THE BANK/SHOUTOUTS - FANTASY FOOTBALL FOLLIES 12
item.description: This is Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo. Quarterback of the Fantasy Football Follies where we don't fact check and we don't stat check. Week 12 in the NFL was SMASHMOUTH FANTASY FOOTBALL with RapaportsDelight going 2-1 in League play. Michael breaks down losing to JD, his upcoming matchup against The Gorilla, high stepping towards the playoffs and being tied for first in the Charity League. Up next is the segment that's sweeping the nation: "That'll Get Ya Benched" followed by another segment that's sweeping the nation "That'll Get Ya Snaps" before helping you "Break The Bank". Michael gives shoutouts to those he beat and the players that beat him this week at DraftKings.com/iamrapaport aka RapaportsDelight. This episode is not to be missed! item.title: EP 228 - TRUMP AMERICA/15K VOTES FOR HARAMBE/YOU PLAYED YOURSELF KAEPERNICK/NEW ATCQ ALBUM/LEBRON TALKS NFL/BIZARRO SVG/SICK F*CK OTW/ALL LOAFS MATTER
item.description: Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo, Gerald Moody aka Co-Hostradamus want to shout out all of the men & women who protect and serve domestically and abroad this Veterans Day and we are happy to bring it to you raw dog without a bag on your day. In this new DTRUMP America if you're going to protest you need to show that you voted. We come HARD BODY KARATE for Colin Kaepernick, racists in the USA, the 15,000 people who voted for Harambe the gorilla and President Elect Trump's divisive behavior & sentiment. We kickoff the smack talk with a Recap of BEATING JON HEIN in the Howard Stern Fantasy Football League, where Michael is in 1st Place with Jason Kaplan in the crosshairs. Up next is the segment that's sweeping the nation: "That'll Get Ya Benched". Then RapaportsDelight advances to the $10M Qualifier with a lot riding on Browns vs. Ravens. item.title: EMERGENCY EP 224 - THE WORST OF DONALD TRUMP aka A SEA OF ORANGE - AN I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST EXCLUSIVE EXTRAVAGANZA
item.description: This is an I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST Chronicle of Donald Trump's Candidacy to be the 45th President of the United States of America. Brought to you by Michael Rapaport & Gerald Moody. Episode 60 on June 22nd, 2015 D TRUMP enters the Presidential Race and insults people of Mexican descent.Episode 70 on July 23rd 2015 D TRUMP doesn't like that John McCain being captured as a Prisoner of WarEpisode 78 on August 18th, 2015 - Kelly Osbourne sayS she'd move to Canada if D TRUMP wins the election Episode 83 on September 9th, 2015 Gerald Moody predicted that Donald TRUMP would become president Episode 107 on December 1st, 2015 we discuss D TRUMP following the anti black propaganda blueprint to get votes and we offer him his a official slogan for the first time.Episode 110 on December 11th, 2015 D TRUMP calls out Muslims, specifically talking greasy about a lack of Muslim athletes. We also go at Don Lemon.Episode 133 on February 26th, 2016 Jeb Bush bows out of the race and Danny Aiello stops by to talk about it.Episode 134 on March 2nd, 2016 the KKK endorses D TRUMP and he doesn't reject it.Episode 137 on March 11th 2016 we discuss how D TRUMP plans to make America great again for the first time.Episode 138 on March 16th, 2016 Marco Rubio drops out of the race and D TRUMP marches on in an 1890s kind of way.Episode 142 on March 22nd, 2016 - Talib Kweli at SOUTH BY SOUTHWEST discussing the 2016 presidential race.Episode 149 on April 14th, 2016 we take aim at people who don't respect presidents. Episode 155 on May 6th, 2016 D TRUMP celebrates Cinco De Mayo even though he talks greasy about Mexicans.Episode 172 on June 17th, 2016 Gerald makes a D TRUMP prediction based on the southern strategy Episode 173 on June 20th, 2016 after the Cavs won the finals and I was distraught, Gerald made another D TRUMP prediction.Episode 176 has Eli Lake for the first time on June 28th and gives us props for being all over Donald TRUMP candidacy even before many political pundits in Washington. Episode 179 & Episode 184 Eli Lake calls back in to discuss the Republican National Convention.Episode 188 on August 5th 2016 we discuss Anthony Sabado Jr. getting black called and George W. Bush shitting on D Trump. Episode 189 on August 6th we came live from Minneapolis, Minnesota where we learned not to talk politics in the Midwest. Episode 190 on August 12th, 2016 D TRUMP belongs in the borscht belt as a comedian, not in the presidential race.Episode 194 on August 19th 2016, Nude D TRUMP statues pop up around NYC. Episode 198 on August 30th, 2016 David Duke endorses Donald TRUMP and D TRUMP doesn't reject it.Episode 203 on September 13th, 2016 Jody Avrigan from Five Thirty Eight Elections joins us to discuss D TRUMP.Episode 206 on September 20th, 2016 we come at Donald TRUMP Jr. & Jimmy Fallon.Episode 208 on September 23rd, 2016 we discuss Don King endorsing D TRUMP and how bugged out that is.Episode 209 on September 27th, Eli Lake calls in to discuss the first presidential debate between D TRUMP and Hilary ClintonEpisode 212 on October 4th, 2016 Gerald endorses D TRUMP for President of the United States to America. Episode 214 on October 11th, 2016 we discuss Grab Her By The Pussy with Eli lake and the fans leave voicemails. Along with the Robert De Niro Line of the Century.Episode 216 on October 17th, 2016 we discuss pussygate and snuffing D TRUMP. Episode 219 on October 18th, 2016 we discuss D TRUMP LIVE IN PHOENIX, ARIZONA Thank you for listening to THE WORST OF DONALD TRUMP: A SEA OF ORANGE. This has been an I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST EXCLUSIVE. Vote for whoever you want but after listening to this, can you really vote D TRUMP on Election Day? To be a part of the RapaportsDelight League please...

item.description: Week 7 in the NFL was SMASHMOUTH FANTASY FOOTBALL and Michael Rapaport is here to talk about it. We kickoff with a Recap of the week that was followed by a tribute to friend of the I AM RAPAPORT PODCAST, Arian Foster aka Former Fantasy Football Beast on his retirement. We then get into the main event: BEATING BERRY in the Howard Stern Fantasy Football League, where Michael is in 1st Place. Up next is the segment that's sweeping the nation: "That'll Get Ya Benched". Michael gives shoutouts to those he beat and the players that beat him this week at DraftKings.com/iamrapaport aka RapaportsDelight and let's you in on players that will help you "Break The Bank" in Week 8. This episode is not to be missed! To be a part of the RapaportsDelight League please join www.DraftKings.com/iamrapaport. item.title: EP 220 - DRAYMOND THE SERIAL D*CK KICKER/SICK F*CK OTW/ALL LOAFS MATTER/CAM CUT THE BS/IG RACISTS AIRED OUT/TALKING TO JAY-Z ABOUT KANYE/NO GOOD JUDGE
item.description: Michael Rapaport aka The Original Sniffer & Gerald Moody "Rhymes with Doody" are coming to you from Money Making Manhattan and they're coming in HOT! With the 2016-17 NBA Season kicking off (pun intended), we're coming off the top for Draymond Green and his low blow kick show antics on the court. The Sick F*ck of the Week is an award that's earned and it given so we're putting these candidates on blast. Dwight Howard is the right man for the Bullying PSA Commercial, an All Loafs Matter tale, Cam Newton needs to cut the BS, Bill Belicheck is a face of the League, Instant Divorce in India, Dog F*cker of the Week, Instagram Racists Getting Aired Out, Bullet Proof Clothing ("Reach for your wallet and live to tell about it"), a Plea for Jay-Z to go at Kanye, A Good Judge, Phife Dawg Stret Naming, A No Good Judge and a whole lotta mo. This episode is not to be missed! Tickets for I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST LIVE! IN NYC ARE NOW ON SALE NOW! item.title: EP 217 - FANTASY FOOTBALL FOLLIES 6 - WINNING THE CHAMPIONS TOURNAMENT/THAT'LL GET YA BENCHED/THE MATTHEW BERRY STERNFL SHOWDOWN/BREAK THE BANK
item.description: Week 6 in the NFL was one of the wildest yet and not just because we started the games in Las Vegas and Ended in Phoenix. In perhaps our best FFF yet (No Facts Checked) we discuss Michael's elation of winning his first Daily Fantasy Football Tournament against non other than 4 CHAMPIONS of DFS. First Michael recaps a the performances of Aaron Rodgers & Oddell Beckham Jr. ON/OFF The Field, Reviewing Penalties, Flopping Contender and more. Up next is the segment that's sweeping the nation: "That'll Get Ya Benched" including words for Stern League Members Lisa Ann and Michael's opponent THIS WEEK ESPN's Matthew Berry. Michael gives shoutouts to those he beat and the players that beat him this week at DraftKings.com/iamrapaport aka RapaportsDelight and let's you in on players that will help you "Break The Bank" in Week 6 with callbacks to Week 5. This episode is not to be missed! To be a part of the RapaportsDelight League please join www.DraftKings.com/iamrapaport. Create multiplayer contests or go Heads Up against The Gringo Mandingo to dance in the monkey cage. For a SMASH MOUTH FANTASY FOOTBALL, FANTASY FOOTBALL AND CHILL, HARD BODY KARATE T's and more please visit www.districtlines.com/iamrapaport Show love! item.title: EP 213 - KANYE WEST ROAST EXTRAVAGANZA- THE GOOD, THE BAD AND THE JUST BECAUSE YOU ARE AN ARTIST DOESN'T MEAN YOU HAVE TO BE AN A-HOLE - BEST OF I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST EDITION
item.description: Since August 2014, the I AM RAPAPORT: STEREO PODCAST aka THE WORLDWIDE PHENOMENON has been presenting you a multitude of topics HARD BODY KARATE without fact checking. We LOVE Hip Hop and discuss it in many of our episodes. One of it's biggest stars for the past decade is Kanye West and he has been caught in the crosshairs of The Gringo Mandingo aka Michael Rapaport for a multitude of reasons. With respect Michael chats with the likes of Mike D (Beastie Boys), Talib Kweli, and Gerald on the subject of The Yeezy including his ups and downs, his antics, and actions on/off the stage. This is: The Good, The Bad and Just Because You Are An Artist Doesn't Mean You Have To Be An A-Hole - Kanye West Bash Extravaganza. This episode extends through his fashion obsession, the chronicles of his beef with Taylor Swift, new music, a plea to bring back that Boom Bap, Award Show performances & speeches, a Birthday Basketball Game, a SNL outburst, Hip Hop Battles, Met Gala, music videos, tweets and a whole lotta mo, This episode is not to be missed! item.description: We're coming in HOT with a Freestyle Friday with Michael Rapaport aka The Gringo Mandingo and Gerald Moody aka The 2015 Podcast Co-Host of the Year. Off the bat we introduce our new I AM RAPAPORT YouTube channel, then we get into it. Kanye West is still chirping at Taylor Swift, in her hometown no less and we prove that he's not about that life. Michael responds to how certain members of The Howard Stern Fantasy Football League ripped him out of bed this past week and tried to vote him out of the league while Howard & Robin moderated. Gerald is not in favor of Lester Holt as the moderator of the debates and calls for Samuel L. Jackson to replace him. We are discussing SOHO S&M, arranged marriage to a dog, All Loafs Matter, Sneaker Chasers, San Fran Sucka Sh*t, Odell Beckham's behavior and teachers continuing to sleep with students. This episode is not to be missed! To be a part of the I AM RAPAPORT League please visit www.DraftKings.com/iamrapaport. Create your own contests or Dance with the Dingo 1 on 1.
